snippet: The families of those onboard missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 launched efforts Saturday to raise at least $15 million to fund a private search as they marked the third anniversary of the plane's disappearance....

headline.main: Families Aim to Raise $15 Million to Search for Flight 370
headline.print_headline: Families Aim to Raise $15 Million to Search for Flight 370

lead_paragraph: The families of those onboard missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 launched efforts Saturday to raise at least $15 million to fund a private search as they marked the third anniversary of the plane's disappearance.
